name: music
status_description: The value of the music channel indicates which piece of music (from the stimuli folder) was played to the participant in a given trial. To convert from the values stored in this channel to the music channel: 1) multiply the value by 20, 2) convert to a string, 3) the file name is then constructed from the resulting 3-element number. For example, if the number is 282 this indicates file 2-8_2.wav from the stimuli folder.
